aboutMe.heading: About Me
aboutMe.paragraph1: I’m Thomas Tepi, a Montréal-based developer and open-source contributor focused on React.js, Node.js, and creating user-friendly web experiences.
aboutMe.paragraph2: I thrive in feature development, refining UI/UX interactions, and writing clear, maintainable code that enhances project functionality and accessibility. Beyond coding, I am also an advocate for sustainable technology and community-driven solutions.
aboutMe.paragraph3: My experience bridges technical expertise with real-world impact, whether it's developing seamless digital experiences or supporting initiatives that empower communities. With a strong foundation in collaboration and problem-solving, I am committed to crafting technology that makes a difference - both in the digital space and beyond.

techStack.techStackSubtitle: Here are some of the technologies I have experience with:

sawyerCamp.title: Sawyer-Camp Farmers CIG
sawyerCamp.description: Built a modern website for Sawyer Camp Farmers in Cameroon to showcase sustainable farming practices, highlight local products, and improve visibility for partnerships, donors, and community growth.
sawyerCamp.longDescription: A modern, mobile-first site that highlights sustainable farming practices, community news, and products. The platform improves visibility for local farmers and creates a trustworthy digital presence for partnerships and donations.
features: Membership registration and sign-in flow for community engagement
Online donations powered by PayPal for secure and fast contributions
Blog/Stories section for community updates
Contact & inquiry forms with validation
SEO metadata and social preview images
contributions: Planned information architecture and UX flow
Built responsive UI and accessibility improvements (WCAG-friendly colors, keyboard nav)
Integrated CMS-like content model for easy updates
Set up deployment, DNS, and CDN caching
Built a PayPal donation flow that connects the website with the backend.

resumeBuilder.title: AI Resume Builder
resumeBuilder.description: Created ResumeCraft, an AI-powered resume builder that lets users securely manage profiles, choose templates, and generate tailored, ATS-friendly resumes using OpenAI to highlight individual strengths.
resumeBuilder.longDescription: ResumeCraft lets users create ATS-friendly resumes by combining structured profile data with AI prompts. Users can pick a layout, tone, and language, then export or iterate quickly.
features: Account auth and secure profile management
AI-assisted content generation with tunable tone/layout
Template selection and live preview
PDF export, multi-language support
contributions: Designed prompt pipeline and server routes for OpenAI calls
Built profile editor and validation logic
Implemented state management and template rendering
Added basic analytics for feature usage

bookMart.title: BookMart
bookMart.description: Developed BookMart, a secure web app for managing book collections with login, search, and full CRUD operations. Users can easily add, update, or remove entries in an intuitive and responsive UI.
bookMart.longDescription: BookMart is a CRUD web app focused on speed and clarity for managing a personal or small-shop book catalog with search and filters.
features: Auth-protected dashboard
Create/Read/Update/Delete books with cover images
Search by title/author and tag filters
Form validation and optimistic UI updates
contributions: Database schema and API endpoints for inventory
Client-side forms and validation
Pagination and query filtering
Dockerized dev environment

beautySpa.title: Annette's Beauty & SPA
beautySpa.description: Delivered a customer-friendly site for Annette’s Beauty & SPA with a service gallery, appointment booking, and Stripe-powered gift cards, helping clients explore, schedule, and purchase with ease.
beautySpa.longDescription: A service-oriented site with booking, service catalog, and payments, tailored for a local salon to increase conversions and repeat visits.
features: Services & pricing pages with rich media
Appointment booking flow
Stripe-powered gift cards and payments
Gallery and testimonials
contributions: Implemented booking UX and form logic
Integrated Stripe Checkout and webhooks
Search-engine metadata and sitemap
Deployed with CDN caching and image optimization

guidefox.title: Guidefox - User Onboarding Tool
guidefox.description: Contributed to Guidefox, an open-source onboarding tool for tours, hints, banners, and helper links. Built admin dashboard features, customization options, and backend integrations for flexibility.
guidefox.longDescription: Guidefox is a self-hosted alternative to commercial onboarding suites. Teams can design tours, banners, hints, and helper links, then deploy them with a lightweight JS agent without exposing user data to third-party SaaS.
features: Permission-based admin dashboard (roles: admin/member)
Create and target tours, hints, banners, popups, helper links
Appearance customization and preview
Versioned publishing with enable/disable and scheduling
Lightweight JS agent for client-side injection
contributions: Built admin dashboard flows for creating/managing guides
Implemented appearance customization (theming, sizes, positions)
Integrated backend APIs and data models
Improved accessibility and cross-browser compatibility

metadata.title: Privacy Policy | Thomas Tepi
metadata.description: This Privacy Policy outlines how I collect, use, and protect your information when you visit my website and associated projects.

introduction.title: Introduction
introduction.text: This Privacy Policy describes how this site and any associated subdomains under the `thomastepi.com` domain collect, use, and store data. By continuing to use `www.thomastepi.com` or any of its subdomains, you agree to the practices described below.

informationCollected.title: What Data Is Collected
informationCollected.subtitle: **Google Analytics (Main Portfolio Site Only)**
informationCollected.description: Google Analytics is used on `www.thomastepi.com` to understand general site usage, but only after you give consent.
list: Device Information (browser type, operating system, device category)
Approximate geographic location (country, region, and city level **only**)
Website Interactions (pages visited, time spent, clicks, scrolling behavior)
Traffic Sources (referral links, search engines, direct visits)
informationCollected.trackingParams: If you click links from the main site to a subdomain, tracking parameters may be added to the URL. These are not read or processed by the subdomains.
informationCollected.identifiableInfo: **No personally identifiable information (PII) is collected or stored**. Your IP address is anonymized, and data is retained for a limited period.

recaptcha.title: **Google reCAPTCHA (Portfolio Site & Resume Builder App)**
recaptcha.description: The main portfolio site (`www.thomastepi.com`) contact form and the Resume Builder App (`resumecraft.thomastepi.com`) authentication forms (sign in / create account) use **Google reCAPTCHA v2 Invisible** to protect against spam and abuse.
recaptcha.subtext: When reCAPTCHA is triggered, it may automatically collect information such as:
list: User interactions with the site (e.g., mouse movements, clicks, keystrokes)
recaptcha.note: This data is sent directly to Google and used solely for security verification.
recaptcha.disclaimer: These forms are protected by reCAPTCHA and the Google <privacy>Privacy Policy</privacy> and <tos>Terms of Service</tos> apply.

scope.title: Scope
scope.subtitle: This policy applies to the following domains and projects:
scope.text: Each subdomain may provide different functionality, but the core data principles outlined here remain consistent.

cookies.title: Cookies and Preferences
cookies.description: This site uses a combination of essential and optional cookies to enhance your experience.
essentialList: *Language Preference:* Stores the language you've selected (e.g English or French) using a cookie so the correct content is shown across pages and visits.
*Cookie Consent Choice:* Saves whether you’ve accepted or rejected analytics cookies so you’re not repeatedly prompted.
*Theme Preference:* Stores your dark or light mode selection in a cookie so your chosen theme is applied consistently across pages and visits. This information is not shared or sent to any server.

*reCAPTCHA Security Cookies:* Set by Google reCAPTCHA to distinguish between humans and bots and to protect forms from abuse. These cookies are essential for the proper functioning of contact and authentication forms.
cookies.impliedConsent: ⚠️ *Implied Consent:* If you continue using the homepage without interacting with the cookie banner and scroll beyond a certain point, this is treated as full consent to store all cookies, including optional ones like Google Analytics. This allows the site to provide a consistent experience and collect anonymized traffic data where applicable.
optionalList: *Google Analytics Cookies:* Used only on the main portfolio site to track anonymized usage data.
cookies.disableNotice: You can disable cookies via your browser settings, though this may affect the user experience.
cookies.retention: Your cookie settings are saved for **90 days**. After that, you’ll be prompted to confirm your preferences again.

contactForm.title: Contact Forms and User Accounts
contactForm.subtitle: Some subdomains may include contact forms or account registration.
contactForm.description: When you submit a message or register, the following information may be collected:
contactForm.storage: This information is stored securely and used solely to respond to your request or provide account-related features.
contactForm.retention: Your message is retained for 6 months to ensure follow-ups can be processed. You may request deletion at any time.

guestUsers.description: Some projects (such as resumecraft.thomastepi.com) allow usage without an account.
list: No **personal data is stored** unless you manually enter it.
guestUsers.text: If you later sign up, **only the data you provide** is stored.
